content: करण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृ-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Making, doing, effecting, producing. {@--2@} (<ab>Ved.</ab>) Clever, skilled. --णः {@--1@} (<ab>Ved.</ab>) An assistant. {@--2@} A man of a mixed tribe. {@--3@} A writer. --णं {@--1@} Doing, performing, accomplishing, effecting; परहित°, संध्या°, प्रिय° &c. {@--2@} Act, action. {@--3@} Religious action. {@--4@} Business, trade. {@--5@} An organ of sense; वपुषा करणोज्झितेन सा निपतंती पतिमप्यंपातयत् <ls>R. 8. 38</ls>, <ls n="R. 8.">42</ls>; पटुकरणैः प्राणिभिः <ls>Me. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 50.</ls> {@--6@} The body; उपमानमभूद्विलासिनां करणं यत्तव कांतिमत्तंया <ls>Ku. 4. 5.</ls> {@--7@} An instrument or means of an action; उपमितिकरणमुपमानं <ls>T. S.</ls> {@--8@} (In Logic) The instrumental cause which is thus defined: --व्यापारवदसाधारणं कारणं करणं. {@--9@} A cause or motive (in general). {@--10@} The sense expressed by the instrumental case (in <ab>gram.</ab>); साधकतमं करणं <ls>P. I. 4. 42</ls>; or क्रियायाः परिनिष्पत्तिर्यद्व्यापारादनंतरम् . विवक्ष्यते यदा यत्र करणं तत्तदा स्मृतम् ... {@--11@} (In law) A document, a bond, documentary proof; <ls>Ms. 8. 51</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">52</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">154.</ls> {@--12@} A kind of rhythmical pause, beat of the hand to keep time; <ls>Ku. 6. 40.</ls> {@--13@} (In <ab>astrol.</ab>) A division of the day; (these Karaṇas are eleven). {@--14@} The Supreme Being. {@--15@} Pronunciation. {@--16@} The posture of an ascetic. {@--17@} A posture in sexual enjoyment. {@--18@} A field. {@--19@} Plastering with the hand. {@--20@} The usage of the writer caste. --णी {@--1@} A woman of a mixed caste. {@--2@} A surd or irrational number.
